website_summaries.verdict: Gets high marks for suction power and lightweight manoeuverability, but not the best choice for thick carpeting.
pros: Transitions from hard floor to carpet without changing any settings
Dust bin is easy to empty
cons: Several reports of a handle malfunction that prevents vacuum reclining
Not the best for thick carpets

customer_reviews.title: My new Favorite cleaning product!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best vacuum cleaner I've ever had! When I was visiting my sister in England she had one and loved it. As soon as I got back to California I ordered one. It came within a week from the UK. There is a conversion plug as it's got a UK plug on it but it charges and works great. Very lightweight, works on hardwood, tile and carpet without changing any settings. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: G-anon

customer_reviews.title: lightweight but not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The suction is great. It is so light that it feels like it is going to break. It needs stronger bolt. I would not buy it again. Too much money for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: lynn  Collins

customer_reviews.title: Great suction and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: This is my second GTECH, I gave my last one to my sister and it is still going strong after 8 years! Tried a different brand and went back to GTECH. Very lightweight and easy to use on all floor types.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Farr

customer_reviews.title: The best vaccum I've had.
customer_reviews.text: We have 3 dogs and I vaccum every day and it's great what it picks up you would not know there are dogs in the house. They are border collies so plenty of hair.
customer_reviews.author: Linzee Brady

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It holds a charge very well and has great suction. I have another one and I love it too! I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: David Lee Pinnick

customer_reviews.title: Terrific product
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my Dyson with the Gtech cordless, then purchased another as a spare! It's that good.
customer_reviews.author: jeffrey gumer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I have an older model that is wonderful on all types of floors. This one is not good on tile. Suction poor, maneuverability lousy, and emptying is difficult. Old one was a breeze to clean out. Would not recommend and if hadn't already thrown out box would have returned after first use. Now sits in closet never to be used again.
customer_reviews.author: treetops

customer_reviews.title: Best I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: The suction is okay. A battery vacuum is never going to provide amazing suction. That being said, it is still the best vacuum I've ever owned (and I've owned a lot). The extra handle in the middle makes doing stairs quick and easy. And it's always ready to go. Perfect for touch ups or quick cleaning and great on bare floors. Once a month I vacuum the carpet with a corded vac with more suction. The rest of the time, I use this one. Easy, lightweight, perfect.
customer_reviews.author: hannah1983

customer_reviews.title: It came with European plug for 220 voltage. I had to request 110.
customer_reviews.text: It is not as powerful as the one I replaced
customer_reviews.author: Jan Hargrave

customer_reviews.title: Found it cheaper
customer_reviews.text: Great vacuum. But I bought the Bissell brand AirRam thru Walmart with 3 year warranty for $200.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Lillybug

customer_reviews.title: Batteries don’t last!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The product works great but the batteries do not last. First one lasted a few months. Purchased a second sweeper a year ago when the first sweeper battery went dead and now today I’m ordering two new batteries because neither one of them work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: It stop working after 2 years, and guess what? Warranty is 2 years. Too expensive for 2 years lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: Mani

product_meta.title: Gtech AirRam MK2 Cordless Vacuum Cleaner, 0.8 L, 22V, Grey/Green
product_meta.description: Break free with cordless cleaning Why use a clunky, corded vacuum cleaner when there’s an easier way to clean your home? Without the cord to hold you back you will be free to spend more time cleaning and less time tripping over the cable or stopping to change plug sockets.
feature_bullets: Powered brush head The Gtech AirRam features the unique AirLOC system* that effortlessly picks up large debris from the surface as you push the vacuum forwards, and locks on the backstroke to suck up embedded dust. Its powerful rotating brush bar makes it ideal for removing stubborn pet hair.

Compact storage Without lots of untidy power cords the Gtech AirRam is easy to store and ready to go when you next need to start cleaning again. For added convenience, the lithium-ion battery pack can be removed for charging if you don't have a plug socket nearby.
Move effortlessly from carpet to hard-floors and back again, with no settings to change

Long run-time Powered by a removable 22V lithium-ion battery, the AirRam gives you up to 40 minutes run-time on one 4-hour charge, long enough to clean the average house twice. A 4-stage LED display indicates how much charge is left in the battery

Easy-empty bin We have designed the Gtech AirRam dirt collection system to be easy to empty. As you clean, dirt is collected and compressed into a capsule in the head of the vacuum and is emptied with a simple slide of the ejector arm.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars1,874 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
